mapper.update: update asn_in_details set order_qty = order_qty - #{updateQty} where asn_in_id = #{asnInId} and asn_line_no = #{asnLineNo} and order_qty - #{updateQty} >= 0
update order_in_details set qty = qty - #{updateQty}, remark = remark || '数量修改' where order_in_id = #{orderInId} and order_line_no = #{orderLineNo} and qty - #{updateQty} >=0
mapper.select: select ai.multiple_receive, ( select decode(count(1), count(decode(qty, order_qty, 1, NULL)), 1, 0) from asn_in_details aid where aid.asn_in_id = ai.asn_in_id and aid.qty = aid.order_qty ) as asn_end from asn_in ai where ai.asn_in_id = #{asn_in_id}
